scripts.build-win-binaries-arm64: npm run cmake-configure-arm64 && npm run cmake-build && npm run copy-exe && npm run windeploy && npm run prep-package-arm64 && npm run package-app-arm64
scripts.build-win-binaries-x64: npm run cmake-configure-x64 && npm run cmake-build && npm run copy-exe && npm run windeploy && npm run prep-package-x64 && npm run package-app-x64
scripts.copy-exe: if not exist final mkdir final && copy .\build\Release\video-simili-duplicate-cleaner.exe final\"Video simili duplicate cleaner.exe"
scripts.windeploy: echo Skipping windeployqt - using static build
scripts.prep-package-arm64: npm run icons && node process-manifest-template.js arm64 appxmanifest.template.xml final\appxmanifest.xml
scripts.prep-package-x64: npm run icons && node process-manifest-template.js x64 appxmanifest.template.xml final\appxmanifest.xml
scripts.icons: copy logo150x150.png final\logo150x150.png && copy logo44x44.png final\logo44x44.png && copy Icon1024.png final\Icon1024.png
scripts.package-app-arm64: MakeAppX pack /d final /p "Video simili duplicate cleaner.arm64.msix"
scripts.package-app-x64: MakeAppX pack /d final /p "Video simili duplicate cleaner.x64.msix"
scripts.clean: npm run cmake-clean && (npm run clean-leftovers || exit 0)
scripts.clean-leftovers: (rmdir /q /s build || exit 0) && (rmdir /q /s final || exit 0) && (del /f "Video simili duplicate cleaner.arm64.msix" || exit 0) && (del /f "Video simili duplicate cleaner.x64.msix" || exit 0)
